snippet: Jaap van Zweden conducted the Philharmonic on Thursday. If the performance was sometimes too feisty and intense, it was certainly exciting.
abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews concert of works by Mahler and Prokofiev performed by the New York Philharmonic, featuring guest conductor Jaap van Zweden and solo pianist Yuja Wang, at Avery Fisher Hall.
lead_paragraph: Jaap van Zweden conducted the Philharmonic on Thursday. If the performance was sometimes too feisty and intense, it was certainly exciting.

headline.seo: Philharmonic, With Jaap van Zweden Conducting Yuja Wang
headline.main: Star Pianist Establishes the Tempo of the Night
headline.print_headline: Star Pianist Establishes The Tempo Of the Night
